name: Tank Fantastic
description:
Tank Fantastic is an indie arcade game made in 2.5D graphics and Sci-Fi style.
In the game you have to control your own tank and destroy enemy tanks before they destroy you. During the battle, you will collect coins along the way, which you will need to improve the various characteristics of the tank in the store in the menu.
In the arena, you will also encounter destructible walls, behind which there are coins.
Improve the characteristics of the tank, fight in the arena and go to the end!
